page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS continued
page.content: As Aviemore continues to develop, the {District Council}faces demands to provide houses for{key}workers.The paper recently reported that Aviemore engineering firm,Highland Components, had warned the Council that the company's future in the village is in danger if they can't provide{houses {for skilled workers.}The firm employs 29 people and manufactures parts for the oil industry but expansion plans which could provide a further 20 jobs locally,have been held up due to the loss of a skilled worker because he could not get a house in the area.The Council are doing all they can to provide housing and are making a special case to the Scottish Office for the Scottish Special Housing Association to provide housing in the area.
